location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 1/1 IV Appointment and transfer of Political Agents (Leave, Pay, Allowances): Major R G Alban CBE, Mr E B Wakefield ICS, Major T Hickinbotham'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged chronologically from the front to the back of the file. Circled serial numbers (red for received correspondence; blue/black for issued correspondence) refer to entries in the notes at the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation system in use starts at the front cover and continues through to the back cover. The folio numbers are written in pencil and can be found in the top right hand corner of the recto side of each folio. Foliation anomalies: ff. 1A and 1B; ff. 91A and 91B; ff. 92A and 92B; ff. 117A and 117B; ff. 145A and 145B; ff. 181A and 181B; ff. 189A and 189B; ff. 215A, 215B, 215C, 215D; ff. 219A and 219B; ff. 242A, 242B, 242C; ff. 279A and 279B. Foliation numbers omitted: 226, 235, 236, 273, 308.

mods.abstract: Papers relating to the appointment and transfer of the following Political Agents, Bahrain: Major Reginald George Evelyn William Alban (served 18 October 1940 to 16 January 1942); Edward Birkbeck Wakefield (served 16 January 1942 to 7 October 1943); and Major Tom Hickinbotham (from 7 October 1943). The papers cover pay, leave and allowances. Includes letters in Arabic.
